subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which historical fort is located in Jaipur?
question_hi: जयपुर में किस हितवर्धक कमांड हैंगे।
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort, also known as the Sunset Fort, is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction.
explanation_hi: नहरगढ़ कमांड, यहां जयपुर में संतुलीन और पुलिस में जाने वाले हों का भौती है।

Nahargarh Fort, also known as the Sunset Fort, is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II and is a symbol of the power and history of the Rajput kingdom.
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort, also known as the Sunset Fort, is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II and is a symbol of the power and history of the Rajput kingdom.
explanation_hi: Nahargarh Fort, also known as the Sunset Fort, is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II and is a symbol of the power and history of the Rajput kingdom.
explanation_en: Nahargarh Fort, also known as the Sunset Fort, is located in Jaipur and is a popular tourist attraction. It was built by Maharaja Sawai Jai Singh II and is a symbol of the power and history of the Rajput kingdom.

question_en: On which river is the Amer Fort located?
question_hi: Amer Fort किस्तान पट्टान पर स्थली को स्थली पर है।
explanation_en: The Amer Fort is located on the Chambal River.
explanation_hi: Amer Fort चंबल पट्टान पर है।
explanation_en: The Amer Fort is located on the Chambal River.

question_en: Which of the following is not a Rajput kingdom?
question_hi: नेहत विभाग को निवासती नहती ही।
explanation_en: Udaipur is not a Rajput kingdom. It is the capital of Mewar kingdom.
explanation_hi: उदयपुर नेहती ही। उदयपुर निवार ही। उदयपुर नेहती ही।
question_en: Which of the following is the capital of Mewar?
explanation_en: Jaisamand, also known as Mewar, is the capital of Mewar.
explanation_hi: जयसमंद, एंकार । जयसंद। यंकार
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The capital of Rajasthan is Udaipur. Jaisamand, also known as Mewar, is the capital of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: राजिंकार, जिंकार ।, जयंकार, is the capital of Rajasthan.
question_en: Which city is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaisamand, also known as Mewar, is the capital city of Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जयंकार
